member.name: IMFSaveJob.BeginSave
member.summary: Begins saving a Windows Media file to the application's byte stream.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the application's byte stream. The data from the source byte stream is written to this byte stream.
Pointer to the interface of a callback object. The caller must implement this interface

Pointer to the IUnknown interface of a state object, defined by the caller. This parameter can be NULL. You can use this object to hold state information. The object is returned to the caller when the callback is invoked.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.
The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFSaveJob.EndSave
member.param: Pointer to the interface. Pass in the same pointer that your callback object received in the method.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFSaveJob.GetProgress
member.summary: Retrieves the percentage of content saved to the provided byte stream.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Persists media data from a source byte stream to an application-provided byte stream.
The byte stream used for HTTP download implements this interface. To get a pointer to this interface, call on the byte stream, with the service identifier MFNET_SAVEJOB_SERVICE.
